conclusion: Plan to analyze image and reason effects of moving light source on shadows
Image shows textured ground with four objects: white vase, red and yellow object, small gray object, black book; each casts a shadow labeled A, B, C, D
Identify shadows A, B, C, D as corresponding to white vase, red and yellow object, small gray object, black book
When light source moves forward, shadows become shorter and more concentrated
Shadow A (white vase) will move forward and become smaller
Shadow B (red and yellow object) will move forward and become smaller
Shadow C (small gray object) will move forward and become smaller
Shadow D (black book) will move forward and become smaller
Conclude shadows A, B, C, D become shorter and more concentrated when light source moves forward
